Music

I have a BA in Music from Seattle Pacific University, and used to do a fair bit of recording and composition.

Unfortunately, I rarely have the time (or energy) for music these days, but I’ve collected a few of my recordings and compositions here.

Recordings

I played lead guitar on all of these.

  • Expect to Weep (from Sun and Rain)
  • Trust in a Sigh (from Ghosts and Spirits)
  • Vetoing Heaven (from Ghosts and Spirits)

Compositions

  • Ganen Jie
  • Thirst for Water, Inquiry for Truth (from Ghosts and Spirits)
  • Ah, Holy Jesus!
  • Fugue in Gm

About Me

Husband and father, musician, software engineer at SEOmoz, open source developer specializing in Ruby and Rails, world traveler and Christian.
